subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rodriguez, the disgraced slugger who has made a career out of usurping story lines with his out-of-bounds behavior, blasted two home runs and drove in the winning run as the Yankees rallied to win.
snippet: Rodriguez, the disgraced slugger who has made a career out of usurping story lines with his out-of-bounds behavior, blasted two home runs and drove in the winning run as the Yankees rallied to win.
